PropertyList.title: Controlable AI carrier
PropertyList.line: Course control is only possible in manual control mode.
Use the ATC/AI->Options dialog to select base/launch/recovery
course, to control deck elevators and deck lights, and
LSO Commentary defaults to ON. It is selected in LSO View for
the selected aircraft or in Approach View for any aircraft that
is within the coverage of the FLOLS and range is less than 4 nm
Radar Display defaults to ON. Parameters may be selected by
clicking on items in either of the CONTROL panels. Items in
the STATUS or ENVIRONMENT panels are NOT clickable
